name: Rail Line
description: A track for wheeled vehicles provides fast and efficient transportation for goods and people. The specialized infrastructure requires significant investment, while the speed and capacity create new opportunities for trade and military movement.
atmosphere: Wheels clatter on iron rails while steam whistles echo across the landscape with industrial urgency. The air carries the metallic scent of iron rails, coal smoke, and the promise of fast movement. Every surface vibrates with industrial progress. Your skin feels the metal's heat and the sense of speed. The taste of industrial progress and mechanical efficiency fills your mouth.
